name: api
description: garden data application - application sur le calendrier du jardin
author: Boly38 <boly380@gmail.com>

scripts.test: echo windows test&& set NODE_ENV=test&& mocha --unhandled-rejections=strict tests/*.test.js
scripts.debug: echo windows test debug mode&& set NODE_ENV=test&& set DEBUG=mocha:*&& mocha --unhandled-rejections=strict tests/*.test.js
scripts.cover: echo windows cover&& set NODE_ENV=test&& nyc --reporter text --reporter cobertura --reporter html --lines 66 mocha tests/*.test.js
scripts.rebuild-ui: pushd front-end&& npm run build&& popd
scripts.travis-test: echo linux travis-test&& export NODE_ENV=test&& nyc --reporter text --reporter cobertura --reporter html --lines 66 mocha tests/*.test.js
